definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
Hwang Jang-yop (1923-2010), North Korean politician known for defecting to South Korea

sentences.english: Ye-eah we wept, when we remembered zion.
sentences.chinese: 燁峯我們哭，當我們記住錫安。

sentences.english: Ye who read here are blessed.
sentences.chinese: 燁誰看這裏有得天獨厚。

sentences.english: He later became a fierce critic of the North.
sentences.chinese: 後來，黃長燁激烈批評北韓。

sentences.english: Elder brother Ye's son, you say how should this matter do?
sentences.chinese: 燁哥兒，你說這事該怎麼辦？

sentences.english: The former politician defected to South Korea in 1997
sentences.chinese: 前政治家黃長燁於1997年叛逃到韓國。

sentences.english: Yup this one is the best tool to improve the quality of the movie.
sentences.chinese: 燁這個人是最好的工具，以提高產品質量的影片。

sentences.english: One who never cries in the might won't be tender enough to comfort others.
sentences.chinese: 沒在案燁哭泣的人，是不會擁有爲人拭淚的溫柔。

definition: surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
camel/white horse with a black mane (archaic)
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
